document_data.name: ''Wall of Wood''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''wall of wood''''' was a magical [[large shield]] found in the [[Cormyr]]ean village of [[Eveningstar]] in the mid-1480s [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: The shield was a large and solid piece of wood, carved with swirling designs.
document_data.Powers: The ''wall of wood'' was exceptionally tough and sturdy, and did well at protecting the bearer. It also greatly amplified the [[positive energy]] and other sources of healing that the bearer both produced and received.
document_data.History: The shield was recovered from [[Uthe Lodge]] by [[adventurer]]s after defeating the [[wood woad]]s [[Prinus]], [[Robur]], and [[Falcata]].
